The shipping fee, inclusive of insurance, is Rs 1000/- (Rupees One Thousand Only) for delivery from any Pin-code in India to our Aukera warehouse. Should you prefer to arrange shipping on your own, Aukera cannot be held accountable for any damage or loss during the transit.
settings.return:
At Aukera, we believe in offering peace of mind with our flexible return, buy-back, and exchange policies. You can return your jewellery within 15 days for a full refund, no questions asked. Our lifetime buy-back facility ensures you can receive up to 90% of the original value when you return your jewellery.

Please note that custom or made-to-order pieces are exempt from these offers.
